name: abducted - demo
description:
Abducted is a game about a Gio (an unfortunate barista from earth) who wakes up on a research vessel, hovering in space .
He soon realises that he is not alone on this ship, but in fact trapped with two strong personalities.  Kain is a politician from earth, who has been abducted alongside Gio and Grey is the alien who has abducted the two.
Gio now has to figure out who to trust and possibly fall in love with as he tries to make his way back to earth.
Abducted deals in explicit gay  themes (male on male). There are detailed illustrations of nudity and sexual acts. All nudity is shown and there are explicit descriptions of consensual sexual acts.
this game is not suitable for anyone under the age of 18.
Deep and immersive game world that deals with sex and aliens2 separate ending for the demo (6 planned for final game)Collectibles system to track and reward your decisions2 unique and interesting romancable characters12.000 word introduction to the world of abducted
Abducted has 3 distinct characters each with their won motivations and own desires for the outcome of this adventure that you are on together.
please download the demo and let us know what you think.
The game is playable for:
MacPC/windowsandroid (in development)
if you want to follow the development of abducted, then you can follow us on twitter @mysteryzonegam1
